backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor implementing authorization, user profiles, and per‑user manga entry storage with add/update/query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two UI feature requests to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the root div and loading the main TypeScript entry module.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing precaching, runtime caching, network-first logic for API calls, and cache‑clearing messaging.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication flow, profile setup gating, service worker registration, and rendering the manga list page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginLogout: Auth button that logs in or logs out and clears identity, React Query caches, IndexedDB, and service worker caches.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new users for a display name and saving it through the profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper providing a collapsible header with auth controls, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/manga/ADD_MANGA_: Checklist for validating Add Manga dialog layout, scroll behavior, and accessibility across different viewport sizes.
frontend/src/components/manga/AddMangaDi: React modal for adding a manga entry, managing form state, validating input, and submitting new entries to the backend.
frontend/src/components/manga/AutoScroll: Component that auto-scrolls long text vertically when it overflows, with pause-on-hover behavior.
frontend/src/components/manga/CoverHover: Draggable hover popup showing manga cover and titles, supporting outside-click close and persistent position.
frontend/src/components/manga/CoverImage: Input field for uploading, previewing, and removing cover images with upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/manga/EditMangaD: Dialog for editing an existing manga entry, resetting on open and submitting only changed fields.
frontend/src/components/manga/EditNotesD: Dialog for editing user notes with save, cancel, and backend readiness handling.
frontend/src/components/manga/FloatingCo: Collapsible floating panel that wraps MangaListControls and toggles visibility with a button.
frontend/src/components/manga/GenreCheck: Displays genres in rows of three with equalized widths and selectable checkboxes.
Interactive manga card handling rating, bookmarks, notes, chapter updates, and cover previews.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaListC: Provides search fields, genre filtering, sorting, alignment controls, and add‑manga actions.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaListP: Main manga list page handling filtering, sorting, pagination, backend readiness, and layout state.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaRowAc: Wraps a MangaCard with edit and delete controls and manages related dialogs.
frontend/src/components/manga/NotesPrevi: Portal-based overlay showing a temporary notes preview when hovered.
frontend/src/components/manga/Pagination: Renders paginated navigation with dynamic page ranges and previous/next buttons.
frontend/src/context/BackendConnectionCo: Provides a React context and provider for sharing a single backend connection state across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor based on the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithRetry.ts: Wraps the singleton backend connection to expose actor state with retry and error info.
frontend/src/hooks/useAllMangaEntries.ts: Fetches all manga entries, caches results offline, and falls back to cached data on errors.
Manages backend actor initialization with retries, timeouts, diagnostics, and identity‑aware session control.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendConnectionS: Returns the shared backend connection context to ensure only one connection loop runs.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReadiness.t: Maps the shared backend connection state into a simplified readiness status interface.
frontend/src/hooks/useCachedCoverImageUr: Returns a cached cover image URL when available and fetches/caches it in the background otherwise.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches and updates the caller's user profile, dependent on backend readiness and identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibraryGenres.ts: Derives a sorted list of unique genres from all manga entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useMangaMutations.ts: Provides React Query mutation hooks for adding, updating, rating, bookmarking, and editing manga entries, with backend readiness checks and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useMangaPage.ts: Empty file or no content provided.
frontend/src/hooks/usePersistentPopupPos: Manages a popup’s persisted screen position using localStorage, clamping within viewport and updating on resize.
frontend/src/hooks/useUniformWatchlistRo: Computes a uniform width for watchlist rows by measuring child elements, using ResizeObserver and deferred measurements.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, and custom utility classes including gold and rainbow effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/sw/registerServiceWorker.ts: Registers a service worker and provides a helper to request cache clearing via postMessage.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrorClassific: Classifies backend errors into categories with retry guidance and exposes a helper to detect retryable errors.
frontend/src/utils/backendNotReadyMessag: Provides a shared backend-not-ready error message and an assert function to enforce backend readiness.
frontend/src/utils/formatChapterNumber.t: Formats chapter numbers, returning integers without decimals and preserving decimals when present.
frontend/src/utils/indexedDb.ts: Offers IndexedDB helpers for opening stores and performing get, put, delete, and key‑listing operations for caching.
frontend/src/utils/offlineCoverImageInde: Provides IndexedDB caching for cover image blobs keyed by principal, manga ID, and URL hash, with helpers to fetch, store, retrieve, and clear images.
frontend/src/utils/offlineMangaCache.ts: Implements legacy localStorage caching of manga metadata with serialization/deserialization and versioned read/write/clear operations.
frontend/src/utils/offlineMangaIndexedDb: Stores and retrieves versioned manga metadata per principal in IndexedDB with serialization, deserialization, and cache clearing.
frontend/src/utils/promiseTimeout.ts: Adds timeout handling for promises via a TimeoutError class and helpers to wrap or create timeout promises.
frontend/src/utils/retryBackoff.ts: Provides configurable exponential backoff retry logic, including jitter, per-attempt timeouts, and a RetryManager for manual control.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending typography, colors, animations, and container settings with added plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state for a manga browsing app, including existing features and pending requests for a completion-status filter and new sorting options.
